title: Running calendar for 10.20.15
text:
FLORIDA TODAY 11:04 a.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Buy Photo Take part in a local 5K to stay in shape and help some great causes. (Photo: FLORIDA TODAY file) Buy Photo 
Oct. 24 
Ghostly Gecko 5K: 6:30 p.m., Eau Gallie Civic Center, Melbourne (Running Zone Race Series Race) 
Oct. 25 
Cocoa Beach Half Marathon: 7:30 a.m., Shepard Park, Cocoa Beach 
Oct. 31 
Cocoa Beach Fall Into Winter 5K: 8 a.m., Behind Coconuts in Cocoa Beach 
Space Coast Crew Zombie Run: 5:30 p.m., Oars and Paddles Park, Indian Harbour Beach 
Nov. 5 
FIT Homecoming 5K: 6 p.m., Meg O’Malley’s, Melbourne 
Nov. 7 
Space Coast Classic 15K and 2 Mile: 7:15 a.m., Ryckman Park, Melbourne (Space Coast Runners Runner of the Year Series) 
Sprint for Sight 5K Run/Walk: 4 p.m., Gleason Park, Indian Harbour Beach 
Run with the Star 2 Miler: 6:30 p.m., Fay Lake Wilderness Park, Port St. John 
Nov. 14 
Turkey Creek 5K Trail Run: 7:30 a.m., Palm Bay Community Center, Palm Bay 
Nov. 15 
Rocketman: 7:20 a.m., Astronaut Hall of Fame, Titusville 
Space Coast Lightfest: 6 p.m., Wickham Park, Melbourne 
Don’t see your race here? Let us know. Email Tim Walters at twalters@floridatoday.com, and we’ll add your run to next week’s calendar. Registration information for the races available at runningzone.com and spacecoastrunners.org 3 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://on.flatoday.com/1LGgKoQ TOP VIDEOS
